title: Samsara
review: For this one I really would consider muting it and listening to my own music selection instead. This is filmed with a better and more modern camera than Koyaanisqatsi and it looks even more beautiful, but the music isn't nearly as good. All of the sound is quiet and subtle in this, which makes watching it less of an experience. There's a YouTube video of clips set to a Shpongle remix that I like a lot. So all I could think while watching the film was how much I wanted to be listening to Shpongle.
